subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The absence of the star point guard Derrick Rose, who tore an anterior cruciate ligament Saturday, is a blow to the Bulls’ bid for their first title since 1998.
snippet: The absence of the star point guard Derrick Rose, who tore an anterior cruciate ligament Saturday, is a blow to the Bulls’ bid for their first title since 1998.
